name: Hardest 4.15 "The Triangle" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Norm say he hated in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
painting.

	Norm, in later episodes, revealed how much he loves to paint. Perhaps he wanted to look more "manly" in front of the other men at the bar.

questions.text: What did Sam say Frasier needed?
questions.correct: something to get back his confidence
questions.explanation:
something to get back his confidence.

	Frasier had hit rock bottom since Diane dumped him. He wasn't even practicing psychiatry anymore at this point.

questions.text: Why did Norm say Wile E. Coyote never caught Roadrunner?
options: He was always outsmarted by Roadrunner.
questions.explanation:
He never ate anything.

	The guys at the bar often got into useless conversations like this one about Wile E. Coyote and Roadrunner. Some one else pointed out, he only chased after that particular roadrunner, so perhaps it was Roadrunner himself that Wile E. Coyote wanted to eat.

questions.text: What did Sam pretend he was suffering from?
questions.explanation:
depression.

	Sam told Frasier that he couldn't eat, couldn't sleep and couldn't have sex. Sam, not wanting anything to happen to his sex life then added, "The sex thing wasn't important, I don't even know why I brought it up."

questions.text: What did Frasier suggest Sam do for his problem?
questions.explanation:
seek a qualified professional.

	Sam told Frasier he wanted Frasier to treat him. Frasier reluctantly agreed.

questions.text: What did Frasier say was the cause of Sam's problem?
questions.correct: Sam was still in love with Diane.
options: Sam hadn't had a date in a while
questions.explanation:
Sam was still in love with Diane.

	Sam denied that he was in love with Diane at first. However, to help Frasier think he solved the problem, Sam agreed that he was in love with Diane.

questions.text: Why was Norm upset with Cliff?
questions.correct: He was the only one who showed up to Cliff's party.
options: Cliff wouldn't stop telling him random facts.
He was just sick of Cliff always hanging out with him.
questions.explanation:
He was the only one who showed up to Cliff's party.

	Cliff threw a painting party to get help with having his house painted. It turned out he just wanted Norm to paint his house because Norm was a good painter, and he was free labor.

Sam's ear nibbles.

	Diane and Sam revealed things they didn't like about each other while they were dating. Another thing Diane didn't like was that Sam bought her steak knives for Christmas which was very impersonal.  She said she knit Sam a scarf and had to take classes to learn how, plus she hand-dyed the fabric herself.

questions.text: What did Frasier say Sam and Diane were?
questions.explanation:
hopelessly in love.

	Sam told Frasier that he wasn't in love with Diane and they made it up to make him feel better. Frasier said they were all a bunch of boobs and he wasn't going to be one any longer. He then told them, "Like it or not you two always have been and always will be hopelessly in love with each other."

questions.text: What did Sam say he'd rather sound like a chipmunk than do?
questions.explanation:
look like a banana.

	Sam told Diane he didn't like Diane's yellow nightie because it made her look like a banana. Diane gets upset and said that he sounded like a chipmunk. He then replied, "I'd rather sound like a chipmunk than look like a banana."
